changeSet.author: Tarun, Venky
changeSet.comment: Adding Concepts for First Consultation Form

changeSet.author: Tarun, Venky

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Government-run health clinic/facility", "UNRWA", "NGO", "Private health care clinic/facility", "Other health facility", "self-referred") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "FC, Source of initial patient referral");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to FC, Source of initial patient referral

changeSet.author: Tarun, Venky

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Beit Hanoun", "Indonesian", "Shiffa", "Al Aqsa", "Naser", "European", "Najjar", "MOH Clinic", "Others") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "FC, MoH facility");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_reference_term where code in ("164408","161011","162477","1549") and retired = 0 and concept_source_id = ( select concept_source_id from concept_reference_source where name = "CEIL" and retired =0 );

changeSet.author: Tarun, Venky

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_reference_term where code in ("MSFF28","GZ93","MSFF79","MSFF85","MSFF91","MSFF80","MSFF92","MSFF71","MSFF70","MSFF75") and retired = 0 and concept_source_id = ( select concept_source_id from concept_reference_source where name = "MSFOCP" and retired =0 );
